title: Metal Gear Solid Integral PSXonPSP
description:
Insturctions:

I recommend getting the following torrent BEFORE attempting to play this or ANY PSXonPSP game: http://thepiratebay.se/tor/4075732/Full_3.90_working_popsloader_for_PSP

This release of Metal Gear Solid: Integral includes 2 eboots. The main game&#039;s eboot has both discs in one. When you complete disc one, press home then choose change discs and choose disc 2. It&#039;s that simple. The second eboot is the VR missions disc which comes with this re-release. If you plan to have both eboots on the same memory stick at once, you&#039;ll need a 2GB stick or better.

I RECOMMEND USING THE 3.72 PRX&#039;S TO PLAY BOTH THE MAIN GAME AND VR MISSIONS!

Enjoy, and remember if you don&#039;t own this game, buy it! It&#039;s available on import websites and eBay and  is a classic PSX game. This re-release is my favorite version of the game we SHOULD have gotten in America when we got the lame addon VR missions disc only.

Ripped by Evil-Eye (AKA Evil-Twin on TPB.org)

Thanks goes to:

Sonic5688: For packaging all Popstation PRX&#039;s to make this game (And MANY others!) work

RhiffSta: The creator of http://popsdb.twystneko.com/ where I downloaded the themes for both of these games.

p1ayer000: For the main game&#039;s PSP theme which is viewable here:

nobbert: For the VR Missions PSP theme.

Also thanks to all of the real PSP coders like Dark_Alex and Co. for opening doors for ALL OF US!
